description:
A serving of deep-dish fleece for core warmth on cold days. It features double-sided plush pile that is super soft and cozy, with a stand-up collar for extra coverage.

  • Double sided Polartec shearling is made from 100% recycled fibres
  • Quarter-length zipper for venting heat on warmer days
  • Elastic binding in collar, cuffs and hem seal in warmth
  • Hip length
name: Patagonia Retro Pile Marsupial - Women's
